description: If you're looking for over-the-calf warmth and comfort while skiing, Smartwool's PhD® Ski Medium socks should do the trick. With Smartwool's Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, Smartwool's Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort, and Smartwool's 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed, performance-oriented fit,Smartwool's thickest ski socks help you focus on the adventure in front of you without uncomfortable feet interrupting any of the fun.
name: Smartwool PhD Ski Medium Socks - Mens
